summary: all book covers use the same model and texture
descriptionHtml:
During these rough times in Skyrim...
No one is making fancy covers for every book...
Books Covers simplified gives this realism to Skyrim.
Enjoy ( check my other simplified mod for potion phials : )Â http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58711/? )
